sourcesContent:
import Input from '../../UI/Input'
import classes from './MealItemForm.module.css'

const MealItemForm = () => {
    return (<form className={classes.form}>
        <Input label='Amount' input={{
            id: 'amount',
            type: 'number',
            min: '1',
            max: '5',
            step: '1',
            defaultValue: '1'
        }} />
        <button>+ Add</button>
    </form>)


}

export default MealItemForm
